original_text: I have chosen a place where my people Israel will live. I have put them in that place, where they can be safe. They will not be afraid of trouble from any enemy. Wicked people will not hurt them any more. That happened in the past, 11 from the time that I chose leaders to rule my people Israel. But now I will keep you safe from all your enemies.
korean_text: 내가 또 내 백성 이스라엘을 위하여 한 곳을 정하여 그를 심고 그를 거주하게 하고 다시 옮기지 못하게 하며 악한 종류로 전과 같이 그들을 해하지 못하게 하여

sentences.original_text: where my people Israel will live
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 나의 백성 이스라엘이 살 것이다

sentences.original_text: I have put them in that place
They will not be afraid of trouble
Wicked people will not hurt them
sentences.korean_translation: 악한 사람들이 그들을 해치지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the time that I chose leaders
But now I will keep you safe
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 이제 내가 너를 안전하게 지켜주겠다
